org.modelio.metamodel.experts.meta

Interface IMetaExpert

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BpmnLaneCreationExpert, DefaultMetaExpert, PartDecompositionCreationExpert

    public interface IMetaExpert
    The MetaExpert tool can answer questions about dependencies between metaclass or elements.
    1. is the model X <>-----dep-> Y possible?
    2. get the default composition dependency between X and Y.
    3. is the model X -------dep-> Y possible?
    4. get possibles dependencies between X and Y.
    where X, Y are either elements or metaclasses and dep a SmDependency name.

      boolean canDep(MClass source, MClass target, String dep)
      Whether or not a dependency 'dep' exists between 'source' and 'target' metaclass.
      boolean canDep(MObject source, MClass target, String dep)
      Whether or not a dependency 'dep' can be established between the 'source' object and an instance of 'target' metaclass based on their metaclass and stereotypes.
      boolean canDep(MObject source, MObject target, String dep)
      Whether or not a dependency 'dep' can be established between the 'source' and 'target' objects based on their metaclass and stereotypes.

    • Method Detail

      • canCompose

        boolean canCompose(MClass owner,
                 MClass composed,
                 String dep)
        Tells whether the owner can own the given composed element using the given dependency name.
        Parameters:
        dependency - optional: The name of the dependency on the owner used to add the composed.
        owner - The owner node, must not be null.
        composed - The composed element, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the composed can be added, else false.

      • canCompose

        boolean canCompose(MObject owner,
                 MClass composed,
                 String dep)
        Tells whether the owner can own an instance of the given metaclass using the given dependency name.
        Parameters:
        dependency - optional: The name of the dependency on the owner used to add the composed.
        owner - The owner node, must not be null.
        composed - The metaclass of the composed element, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the composed can be added, else false.
